context: Do you have any mystery novels like The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
Sure. That book is part of a series. The next in the series is A Spot of Bother.
I have already read that one. What about some other novels by Mark Haddon?
He also wrote the Red House.
Has he written any books for children ?
The series of The Curious Incident of the dog in the Night was written for children and won the Guardian Children's Prize.
I have already read that one.
Ok sorry, those are the only children's book's I could locate. Can I help you find something else?
entity: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
resp: Mark Haddon also wrote a Spot of Bother.
